Verifying that Cytoscape is running

Source: R/methodsInternal.R
isCytoscapeRunning.Rd

Verifying that Cytoscape is running

isCytoscapeRunning()

Value

a logical indicating if Cytoscape is running.

Author

Astrid Deschênes

Examples


## Test if Cytoscape is running
gprofiler2cytoscape:::isCytoscapeRunning()
#> Oh no! I can't find Cytoscape. RCy3 can not continue!
#> Please check that Cytoscape is running, CyREST is installed and your base.url parameter is correct.
#> Unable to connect to Cytoscape. 
#> CX JSON file will be created.
#> [1] FALSE
